location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Morier, Tehran to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Resident that James Morier has issued a set of bills in favor of a number of individuals for 'the convenience' for some members of the British detachment on route back to India from Persia. The names of these persons and the sums of money involved are listed within the letter.
